name: Just Dice
description:
Sometimes you Just don't have enough Dice. Well I have you cover! This is the Just a Dice Sandbox, play as you please.

Controls :

- Click on dice to select it.

- WASD to move 

- Click and drag to rotate

- Press C to clone Die

- Q or E to change camera view

- Space to roll

Try playing Towering Dice by Marcmagus in Just Dice.
Let Marc and me know how high your tower got.

Good luck!
